flightNumber.description: The unique identifier for the flight.

fromAirportIata.description: The Iata or code of the departure airport.

fromAirportName.description: The name or code of the departure airport.

toAirportIata.description: The Iata or code of the arrival airport.

toAirportName.description: The name or code of the arrival airport.

departureTimestamp.description: The date and time when the flight departs.

arrivalTimestamp.description: The date and time when the flight arrives.

duration.description: The duration of the flight in minutes.

baggageRules.description: Rules and restrictions for baggage on the flight.

price.description: The calculated price for the flight.
